data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Baleares, Islas Baleares, Spain to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baleares, Islas Baleares, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,095,400 people living in Baleares through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 85 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Baleares, Islas Baleares, Spain.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Baleares, Islas Baleares, Spain.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Baleares who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Manacor
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Manacor, Islas Baleares, Spain.
Spirit, please defend the 17,540 believers in Baleares against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 17,540 believers in Baleares, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the county of Baleares, Islas Baleares, Spain has a population of 1,095,400.

We estimate Baleares has 17,540 people who might know Jesus, 829,310 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 248,550 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 17,540 believers in Baleares to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
